title: satellite provider
extract: Satellite television is a service that delivers television programming to viewers by relaying it from a communications satellite orbiting the Earth directly to the viewer's location. ... Satellite television provides a wide range of channels and services.
extract_html: Satellite television is a service that delivers television programming to viewers by relaying it from a communications satellite orbiting the Earth directly to the viewer's location. ... Satellite television provides a wide range of channels and services.
